title: Riot, if I transfer back to my original server will my contribution towards ocean week be removed?
body:
I transferred to Oceania to help out with ocean week, i love nature/animals and thought it was so cool that you guys did something like that, although all of my friends are asking when I'm coming back. If i transferred back now would my contribution to the Ocean Week Reef statue be removed? Do you already have a compiled list of all the summoners that contributed? I don't mind waiting, I'm actually having more pleasant encounters with blind pick summoners here than I did before.{{champion:36}} 

Thanks for hosting such a great event! {{champion:111}}
